key.description: A unique slug for the sport. Use this as the "sport" param in the /odds and /scores requests

active.description: Indicates if the sport is in season

description.description: A brief description of the sport. Subject to change (for example, if sponsors change)

title.description: A presentable title of the sport. Occassionally this value can change, for example if a league undergoes a name change or change in sponsorship.

has_outrights.description: Indicates if the sport has outrights markets.
